title: Amazon lawsuit ‘threat to all internet users’: Perplexity
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) startup Perplexity termed the lawsuit brought by Amazon against its agentic shopping tool a “threat to all internet users.” The online retail giant has approached the US District Court for the northern district of California to prohibit the use of Perplexity’s Comet AI agent on its platform, citing security risks and misconduct.
content:

title: Gemini AI to transform Google Maps experience
description: Google Maps is heading in a new direction with artificial intelligence sitting in the co-pilot’s seat.
content:

title: Key Nodes Where AI Chatbot Solutions Reduce Operational Costs and Boost Customer Retention
description: Artificial Intelligence chatbots are transforming how businesses interact with customers. title: Cordaroys Launches "Don’t Mess with Roy,” a Hilarious Micro-Sitcom About a Rogue AI Running the Company
description: GAINESVILLE, Fla., Nov. 05, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Cordaroys, the furniture brand known for its convertible bean bag chairs, is bringing its humor and creativity to the screen with the debut of 'Don’t Mess with Roy,” a six-episode micro-sitcom that follows an artificial intelligence running wild inside the company’s social media accounts.

title: It’s Cool to Have No Followers Now
description: As social media has become older, more manipulable, and more automated by artificial intelligence, flouting online popularity has gained a new cachet, Kyle Chayka writes.
content: There are many ways to be big on social media, but they are not created equal. Maybe an account belongs to a popular brand or to a famous person, whose online following is preordained, no exertion required. Maybe one’s internet fame is homegrown and ... [6391 chars]

title: AI-powered STAR helps US couple in late 30s fulfil their parenthood dream
description: An artificial intelligence-based tracking system has helped a US couple in their late 30s to fulfil their wish of becoming parents. While manual processes failed, the AI-based system identified a viable sample after scanning through 25 lakh images for two hours.
content: An artificial intelligence-based tracking system has helped a US couple in their late 30s to fulfil their wish of becoming parents. While manual processes failed, the AI-based system identified a viable sample after scanning through 25 lakh images fo... [2096 chars]

title: UK Schools Embrace Future: New Curriculum Targets Fake News, AI, and Skills
description: The UK's Department for Education announces a major curriculum overhaul, introducing lessons on spotting fake news and artificial intelligence, reducing exam volume, and enhancing employability skills. Key reforms include teaching financial fundamentals, a compulsory citizenship module, and promoting outdoor and sporting activities. Implementation begins in September 2028.
content: The Department for Education (DfE) has announced a landmark overhaul of the school curriculum in what is being hailed as the most significant change in a decade. This initiative aims to arm pupils with essential skills for the future, including the a... [679 chars]

title: CMU researchers find selfish traits in cutting-edge AI
description: Artificial intelligence can be oh so human. New research from Carnegie Mellon University shows AI systems meant to mimic human reasoning have selfish tendencies, compared to simpler models. Teacher-student duo Hirokazu Shirado, an associate professor at the university’s Human-Computer Interaction Institute, and doctoral candidate Yuxuan Li released their findings last
